ai-kv20.6:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv20.6:1.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv20.6:1.12_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv20.6:1.16_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv20.6:1.20_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv20.6:2.5_0: “‘This is the noble truth of suffering.’ Such was the vision, knowledge, wisdom, realization, and light that arose in me regarding teachings not learned before from another.
ai-kv20.6:2.6_0: ‘This noble truth of suffering should be completely understood.’ Such was the vision that arose in me ...
ai-kv20.6:2.7_0: When I completely understood they’re fully understood. ...
ai-kv20.6:2.8_0: ‘This is the noble truth of the origin of suffering.’ ...
ai-kv20.6:2.9_0: ‘This noble truth of the origin of suffering should be given up.’ Such was the vision that arose in me ...
ai-kv20.6:2.11_0: ‘This is the noble truth of the cessation of suffering.’ ...
ai-kv20.6:2.12_0: ‘This noble truth of the cessation of suffering should be realized.’ Such was the vision that arose in me ...
ai-kv20.6:2.14_0: ‘This is the noble truth of the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.’ ...
ai-kv20.6:2.15_0: ‘This noble truth of the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering should be developed.’ Such was the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering. ...
ai-kv20.6:2.16_0: When I had developed and cultivated these things,
ai-kv20.6:2.20_0: For the knowledge of the twelvefold supermundane knowledge
ai-kv20.6:2.21_0: The story of knowledge is finished.
ai-kv20.6:3.1_0: or the murderer of his mother and father, a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha, an animal, or the ghost realm. He doesn’t know the animal realm, or the ghost realm. He doesn’t go to hell for animals, there is no place of loss, the bad places, the underworld.
ai-kv20.6:4.1_0: There is merit and (there) in the past, and the future,
